name: Dribbling Champion
description:
Now it's your turn to dribble the ball!

Tap the screen at the right moment to change ball direction!
Keep the ball from falling of the green blocks!
Collect the trophies!

Features:
- Simple One-Touch Controls
- Endless Gameplay
- Fun Sounds
- Compete with Friends and Family on the Leaderboard



How to play game:
- Tap the screen at the right moment to change ball direction
- Keep the ball from falling of the green blocks
- Gain points with each collected trophy
- Go far and conquer the leaderboard

Ready? Set! Roll! How high can you score?

FYI! Dribbling Champion is free to download and play, but, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 16 years of age to download or play Dribbling Champion.

A network connection is also required.

Privacy Policy: https://gbtigames.com/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service: https://gbtigames.com/terms-of-service/
